name: Crystalien Conflict Remake
description:
A Crystalien Conflict Remake made in the Godot game engine.

The current version has the full campaign of the original, along with a level editor and multiplayer versions (multiplayer is not on itch.io).

If you want to join the discord send a friend request to B1er0l14m#9542 and ask to join.

This project is a fan game and is not affiliated or associated with The Lego Group in any way.
